title: Obstetric fistula
summary: Obstetric fistula is a medical condition in which a hole develops in the birth canal as a result of childbirth.[1][2] This can be between the vagina and rectum, ureter, or bladder.[1][4] It can result in incontinence of urine or feces.[1] Complications may include depression, infertility, and social isolation.[1]
